questions.text: What is the time complexity of binary search?
questions.explanation: Binary search halves the search space each step, giving O(log n).

questions.text: Which data structure uses LIFO ordering?
What is the worst-case space complexity of a hash table?
questions.explanation: In the worst case, all keys hash to the same slot, requiring O(n) space.

questions.text: Which traversal visits the root node first?
questions.explanation: Pre-order traversal visits Root → Left → Right.

questions.text: What is the minimum number of edges in a connected graph with n vertices?
questions.explanation: A tree (minimum connected graph) has exactly n-1 edges.
